text: Mbe maaŋ mbuav kim, aua phunini vhɨzgim, zumgum mba Efesus ŋgu bakɨme gari fhɨga suigi guma, mba gumgi gu mbigir ŋgarigim, mbe fhura vhuagi. Mbe vhuagim, ana khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde kha Efesusiŋ gumgi gu mbigi, nde na mbarara. Maaŋgi guma nde Efesusiŋ mba wari won mbiga bakɨme Artemis rotu mbui phena garav, vhɨra mba mbe thɨvigi kɨm, ana buivar kege rɨgi. Maaŋgi guma nen kakagi?
